metadata.title: Pyaari Maa | Stand Up Comedy | Aashish Solanki
metadata.description:
Pyaari Maa! ❤️
This #standupcomedy set is all about my mother, her unique disciplinary methods, middle-class madness, and those funny little moments that made our simple life unforgettable.

It is #cleancomedy and relatable friendly jokes. 
Enjoy!

Do share the video with your family and friends.

Don’t forget to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE.

For Live Show Tickets: https://linktr.ee/aashishsolanki
Follow me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ashishsolanki_1/
For business enquiries: info.aa
